page.title: 08EDUCATION
page.content: In Belshill and Mossend there are 8 Primary Schools and 2 Secondary schools.The Primary Schools are Mossend Primary,Noble Primary, Belvidere Primary,which together with Lawmuir Primary, which is slightly outside the area under review, act as feeder schools to Bellshill Academy Senior Secondary School. St.Gerard's Primary,Sacred Heart Primary and Holy Family are the feeder schools for Cardinal Newman R.C. High School. Bellshill Academy was built in the 1890s By Bothwell Parish School Board was extended 10 years later.It was modernised and further extended in the 1960s. The roll of the Academy at present is about 1000 pupils,it is a comprehensive school catering for all pupils in the area.
